titleInfo.title: Letter from Andrew Allan [Allen], Acting Secretary to the Board of Superintendence, Fort William, Calcutta to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter is instructing the Resident to arrange for the shipment of a herd of horses (colts and fillies) direct to Bengal, as opposed to the longer route via Bombay. It notes that a previous shipment of mares was lost during transportation via the Ahmed Shah.
